events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.
events.description_zh: 在所选内容更改时调用的处理程序。

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

fullWidth.description: Whether the tabs should take the full width of its parent.
fullWidth.description_zh: 选项卡是否应采用其父制表符的全宽。

:disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.
:disabledKeys.description_zh: 已禁用的项目键。无法选择、聚焦这些项目或以其他方式与之交互。

:selectedKey.description: The key for the currently selected item.

:defaultSelectedKey.description: The key for the initially selected item.

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the tabs should allow empty selection.
disallowEmptySelection.description_zh: 选项卡是否应允许空选择。

keyboardActivation.description: Whether tabs are activated automatically on focus or manually.
keyboardActivation.description_zh: 选项卡是在对焦时自动激活还是手动激活。

:motionProps.description: The props to modify the cursor framer motion animation. Use the `variants` API to create your own animation.
:motionProps.description_zh: 用于修改光标成帧器运动动画的道具。使用“变体”API 创建您自己的动画。

disableCursorAnimation.description: Whether the cursor should be hidden.

isDisabled.description: Whether the tab list should be disabled.
isDisabled.description_zh: 是否应禁用选项卡列表。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the tab list should be animated.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否应对选项卡列表进行动画处理。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the card slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为卡槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main tabs slot, it wraps the items and the panels.
slots.description_zh: 主选项卡插槽，它包装项目和面板。

slots.name: tabList
slots.description: The tab list slot, it wraps the tab items.
slots.description_zh: 选项卡列表槽，它包装选项卡项。

slots.name: tab
slots.description: The tab slot, it wraps the tab item.
slots.description_zh: 选项卡插槽，它包装选项卡项。

slots.name: tabContent
slots.description: The tab content slot, it wraps the tab content.
slots.description_zh: 选项卡内容槽，它包装选项卡内容。

slots.name: cursor
slots.description: The cursor slot, it wraps the cursor. This is only visible when disableAnimation=false
slots.description_zh: 光标插槽，它包裹光标。仅当 disableAnimation=false 时才可见

slots.name: panel
slots.description: The panel slot, it wraps the tab panel (content).
slots.description_zh: 面板插槽，它包裹选项卡面板（内容）。
